channel.title: Chicago Internet Rock Mom Music Design on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago Internet Rock Mom Music Design on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Addition
item.description: Check out me.. build one for yourself… I found some chicago based design kids. It is neat to see the internet that I know and love suddenly appear in a physical form around me… For design-geek events check out Anonymous Federated. It seems to be cool.. but has no events posted at this moment. Here is a good indie rock music review site… that is ran by this guy maybe.. I guess the test is whether it will hold up to pitch fork.
